text: Adalberto Costa Júnior (born 8 May 1962) is an Angolan politician. He is the current president of UNITA and a member of the National Assembly of Angola. He was the godson of Jonas Savimbi. In November 2019, Júnior was elected as president of the UNITA, ending Isaías Samakuva's 16-year term. Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan politicians
title: Adalberto Costa Júnior
